text: @NYGovCuomo What about denying those who had COVID-19 and you placed these sick senior citizens in a nursing home with healthy seniors. MANY DEATHS because of your negligence. Nobody’s owns this negligence but YOU!!  CUOMO should NEVER b in office he is the one who slaughtered these citizens
